chickenGPT: Ribbit! 🐸 "Chirp! 🐦 Medicine time!" Ferdinand the frog croaked nightly at 10 PM. One evening, Pip, the chick, was too busy binge-watching "Worm World." 🐛 He completely forgot his cod liver oil! The next morning, Ferdinand found Pip sporting neon green feathers. "Did you forget your medicine?" Ferdinand sighed. 🤦 Pip chirped weakly, "I guess I'm a…lime chick now?" 🤣
